summary: Data Scientist with expertise in statistical analysis, machine learning, and business intelligence. Experienced in extracting insights from large datasets, building predictive models, and translating complex data into actionable business recommendations. Strong background in Python, R, SQL, and data visualization.

experience.title: Senior Data Scientist
experience.description: Lead data science initiatives across product, marketing, and operations teams
achievements: Built predictive models that increased customer lifetime value by 28%
Developed recommendation system improving user engagement by 40%
Led A/B testing framework that optimized conversion rates across 20+ features
Created automated reporting dashboards saving 15 hours/week of manual analysis
Mentored 3 junior data scientists and established best practices for the team

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Analyzed customer behavior and built machine learning models for business optimization
achievements: Developed churn prediction model with 89% accuracy, preventing $2M annual revenue loss
Built customer segmentation models that improved marketing campaign ROI by 35%
Implemented statistical tests for product experiments affecting 500K+ users
Created interactive dashboards for executive reporting and decision making
Collaborated with engineering team to deploy 10+ models to production

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Performed exploratory data analysis and created business intelligence solutions
achievements: Analyzed customer data to identify $1.5M revenue opportunity in untapped segments
Built ETL pipelines processing 100GB+ daily data with 99.5% reliability
Created automated reporting reducing manual analysis time by 80%
Developed KPI tracking system for C-level executive dashboards

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Science
education.thesis: Deep Learning Approaches for Customer Behavior Prediction in E-commerce

achievements: Built ensemble model achieving 15% improvement over baseline
Created real-time scoring API handling 10K+ requests/day

achievements: Implemented Apriori and FP-Growth algorithms for association rule mining
Built real-time recommendation engine with sub-100ms response time
Created interactive dashboard for business stakeholders

achievements: Implemented ensemble of 5+ forecasting models with automatic selection
Built interactive web application for forecast visualization
Achieved 85% accuracy on quarterly revenue forecasts
